General.Name: Hyundai Mipo Dockyard
General.Description: Hyundai Mipo Dockyard Co., Ltd. manufactures, repairs, and remodels ships in South Korea. It offers container, gas, and bulk carrier, as well as special ship and chemical tanker. The company offers LPG carriers, pure car and truck carriers, juice carriers, and ethylene carriers. In addition, it builds mid-sized petrochemical carriers, mid-sized container carriers, container/RO-RO vessels, and asphalt carriers. Hyundai Mipo Dockyard Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1975 and is headquartered in Ulsan, South Korea.
